channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 250 Years After Thomas Paine’s Common Sense, We Could Really Use Some

item.title: The Supreme Court Wins a National Championship
item.description: Indiana was aided by a robed former jock.

item.title: Elon Musk predicts ‘agonizingly slow’ Cybercab and Optimus rollout. But he’s not giving up on Tesla’s big bet on robots
item.description: Tesla’s production rate will “eventually end up being insanely fast,” Musk said.

item.title: NYT Journos Accusing Trump Of ‘Perfidy’ Have No Idea What They’re Talking About
item.description: Factual circumstances reported by the Times do not prove that perfidy was committed, even if the correct criteria had been articulated.

item.title: Ken Griffin says America was sent an ‘explicit warning’ from the bond market and it’s time to get the national debt in order
item.description: "I think there's an explicit warning that if your fiscal house is not in order, the bond vigilantes can come out and retract their price," Ken Griffin...

item.title: Trump and world leaders sign Gaza Board of Peace charter
item.description: President Donald Trump inaugurated the Board of Peace during his appearance at the World Economic Forum's summit in Davos this week.

item.title: The Trump TACO trade is driving up the price of gold as central banks hoard bullion to hedge against the dollar
item.description: Gold has overtaken the euro and U.S. Treasuries as the preferred source of reserves for central banks, the team at LPL Financial reported.

item.title: Trump Needs To Emulate One Of His Favorite Presidents To Crush The Blatant Insurrection In Minnesota
item.description: Trump has a momentous choice ahead of him: stand firm against chaos or allow the situation to spiral out of control.

item.title: Sanders accuses Trump of pushing US and world ‘toward authoritarianism’
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders claims President Donald Trump is working to shift the United States and the world in the direction of "authoritarianism."

item.title: Exclusive: Cubby raises $63 million in Goldman Sachs-led funding to scale self-storage software
item.description: Cubby just raised a $63 million Series A, led by Growth Equity at Goldman Sachs Alternatives, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.description: As the population ages, opportunities to complement caregivers with AI and robotics abound.

item.title: Here’s Where J.D. Vance And Pro-Lifers Should Compromise, And Where They Shouldn’t
item.description: Pro-lifers should realize how little political power they have, and to take the modest wins for life that this administration can offer.
